attributes.title: Ashtanga Yoga: Asteya (Non-stealing): Patanjali Sutras 88 - Nithyananda Morning Satsang 21 Dec '10
attributes.description: In this discourse, living enlightened master and avatar Paramahamsa Nithyananda speaks on the 88th Patanjali Yoga Sutra which describes about Asteya (non-stealing). He describes Patanjali's fool proof way on economics of wealth generation for any society and civilization. He talks something paradoxical when he says non-stealing leads to wealth generation. He says, "The Ultimate Wealth is stealing millions of hearts! Not ordinary wealth, stealing millions of hearts!" He also talks about Upanishads which reveal the same truth about non-stealing. He says, "By non-stealing enjoy the whole world, by renouncing the whole thing. The very logic on which Indian economy is built is explained in this one sutra. If patanjali is followed there will not be any economic crisis." Watch the full discourse to know more on this.
